column1: Uchi////Tried the vegetarian omakase and it might have been the best meal I've ever had. It was my first time trying sushi
column2: so i didn't know what to expect
column3: but I was blown away. Every single item the chef prepared was delicious with unique flavor combinations and unlike anything i've tasted. The servers were very attentive
column6: and explaining what each dish is. The ambiance is also very beautiful and has an expensive feel to it.
